title: Practice Like a Pro: The Greensboro Batting Center Method — Manuscript + Companion Agents (PLAP Pack)
description: Citable archive of the manuscript for 'Practice Like a Pro: The Greensboro Batting Center Method' (Justin Goldston, PhD) plus a companion four-agent toolkit (Player/Parent/Coach/Entrepreneur) and navigation spine (CROSSWALK.md + MANIFEST.json) enabling repeatable training plans, coaching session scripts, parent routines, and facility operating systems aligned to Reps • Responsibility • Resilience.
notes: Zenodo GitHub integration mints DOIs per repository (not subfolders). If archiving from this subfolder, create a release ZIP bundle and upload it to Zenodo. Ensure any images/logos included are owned or used with permission.
